posts.post_title: T206 Red Hindu For Sale Price Reduced
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Lee
First of all, thanks for the insult Art, it was appreciated.

How many times I bid on something and in what fashion I do it should be ZERO concern of yours. Yeah, I bought the card a few weeks ago and now want to sell it, so what? There is nothing wrong with this and many others on the board do it. Why don't you go and bother them for awhile.

Bottomline, it is what I want to charge for a card, if no one buys it, so be it. If you do not want the card, please restrain yourself from commenting.
